data.text: Of broad or liberal scope; comprehensive.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Including or concerning all humankind; universal.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.
from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Of or involving the Roman Catholic Church.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Of or relating to the universal Christian church.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Of or relating to the ancient undivided Christian church.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Of or relating to those churches that have claimed to be representatives of the ancient undivided church.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: A member of a Catholic church, especially a Roman Catholic.
data.attributionText: from The American Heritage® Dictionary of the English Language, 5th Edition.

data.text: Pertaining to all kinds of people and their range of tastes, proclivities etc.
data.attributionText: from Wiktionary, Creative Commons Attribution/Share-Alike License.
